title: Heavy Armour Proficiency
content:
Heavy Armour Proficiency Wearing Heavy Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

Heavy Armour Proficiency

Wearing Heavy Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

Heavy Armour Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
